songs.title: BLUE
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Troye Sivan]
Love hits hard, I know
All your lights are red, but I'm green to go
Used to see you high, now you're only low
All your lights are red but I'm green to go

[Chorus: Troye Sivan & Alex Hope]
I want you
I'll colour me blue
Anything it takes to make you stay
Only seeing myself
When I'm looking up at you
I want you
I'll colour me blue
Anything it takes to make you stay
Only seeing myself
When I'm looking up at you

[Verse 2: Alex Hope]
I can't say no
Though the lights are on
There's nobody home
Swore I'd never lose control
Then I fell in love with a heart that beats so slow

[Chorus: Troye Sivan & Alex Hope]
I want you
I'll colour me blue
Anything it takes to make you stay
Only seeing myself
When I'm looking up at you
I want you
I'll colour me blue
Anything it takes to make you stay
Only seeing myself
When I'm looking up at you

[Verse 3: Alex Hope]
I know you're seeing black and white
So I'll paint you a clear-blue sky
Without you I am colour-blind
It's raining every time I open my eyes
I know you're seeing black and white
So I'll paint you a clear-blue sky
Without you I am colour-blind
It's raining every time I open my eyes

[Partial Chorus: Alex Hope]
I want you
I'll colour me blue
Only seeing myself
When I'm looking up at you
When I'm looking up at you

[Chorus: Troye Sivan & Alex Hope]
I want you
I'll colour me blue
Anything it takes to make you stay
Only seeing myself
When I'm looking up at you
I want you
I'll colour me blue
Anything it takes to make you stay
Only seeing myself
When I'm looking up at you

[Outro: Alex Hope]
I want you
I'll colour me blue
Anything it takes to make you stay
Only seeing myself
When I'm looking up at you
